title: Dispersive Technologies to Demonstrate Its Virtualized Networks at Gartner Symposium/ITxpo
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 7:10 AM   Dispersive Technologies 
ALPHARETTA, Ga., Sept. 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Dispersive Technologies, Inc. ( www.dispersivetechnologies.com ), a leading innovator in software-defined networking (SDN), will demonstrate its virtualized network solutions at the Gartner Symposium/ITxpo October 4-8, 2015 in Orlando, Florida. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150928/271490LOGO 
To showcase differences for both streaming video and large file transfer, the company will run Dispersive(TM) Virtualized Networks (DVN) and a standard virtual private network (VPN) in a side-by-side comparison. Both systems will run on a local area network into which a 25ms latency has been introduced. This will simulate the real-world conditions of a wide area network sending traffic between Chicago and San Francisco. 
"We want people to see a real, working virtualized network that takes a different approach," says Robert W. Twitchell, Jr., founder and CEO of Dispersive. "And we want them to see how it compares with VPN, a system most enterprises use today to protect data-in-motion." 
Twitchell, who is also a Department of Defense cyber and mobile warfare expert, will deliver a speech at the symposium entitled "Dispersive(TM) SDN: Control at The Edge." The presentation will outline the advantages of Dispersive's solution over not only VPNs, but SDNs as well. 
"With control at the edge, our integrative design delivers traffic with speed, security and reliability over the Internet," Twitchell explains. "This works especially well in federated IT environments, where our solution does more than protect critical data. It also improves application performance, creates a more productive mobile workforce and eliminates reliance on high-priced proprietary hardware and private networks." 
Dispersive's DVN vs. VPN demonstration will be at Booth 26 in the Emerging Technologies Pavilion at the symposium. Twitchell's talk will be at 1:30 p.m. ET on October 7 at the pavilion theater. 
For more information about Dispersive Technologies and its innovative solutions, visit www.dispersivetechnologies.com . 
The Gartner Symposium/ITxpo is an industry-wide conference for top CIOs and their teams, showcasing the top technology solutions providers from around the globe. 
About Dispersive Technologies, Inc. Dispersive Technologies delivers software-defined solutions that virtualize routing and data storage for IP-based networks. Their virtualized routing platform delivers data with speed, security and reliability - and does it across standards-based IP networks. Their software-defined storage solution securely stores at-rest data and moves it dynamically within the virtualized environment. When recalled or queried, data delivery is quick, secure and reliable. Together, these platforms improve software-defined networking and make the Internet fast, secure and reliable. By streamlining and securing communications and data flow, Dispersive Technologies' solutions allow organizations to perform more efficiently and reduce costs. To learn more, visit www.dispersivetechnologies.com .
